### Nibz/cherry pick/1420 (#1421)

# PR Summary

This PR introduces a change in the Dockerfile by adding a command to remove the `poetry.lock` file from the application directory during the build process. The addition ensures that any potentially stale dependency information in `poetry.lock` is eliminated from production builds, possibly to avoid conflicts or security issues with outdated lock files. This change specifically targets the `litellm/Dockerfile.customermanaged` file and does not affect application functionality, focusing instead on build-time file cleanup.
